Headline: Temporary #52 Kedzie/California Reroute at Kedzie/21st
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted near Kedzie/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Ogden, California, Cermak, Kedzie, and resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

Allow extra travel time.
